close_oven_door.description: Close the oven door by swinging it to the closed position.

open_oven_door.description: Open the oven door by swinging it to the open position.

status_check.description: The oven door is already in the closed position.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the oven's knob to adjust the heat level.

press_button.description: Press the button to turn the oven on/off.

clean_oven_body.description: Clean the oven body to remove cooking residues.

clean_whole_oven.description: Clean the entire oven, including its body, door, button, and knob.
